H0.text: Which US gangster was released from Alcatraz prison in November 1939. George "Machine Gun" Kelly

H1.text: Which US gangster was released from Alcatraz prison in November 1939. Meyer Lansky

H2.text: Which US gangster was released from Alcatraz prison in November 1939. Lucky Luciano

H3.text: Which US gangster was released from Alcatraz prison in November 1939. CaPone

A4.text: Capone completed his term in Alcatraz on January 6, 1939, and was transferred to the Federal Correctional Institution at Terminal Island.

A5.text: Capone was paroled on November 16, 1939, after his wife Mae appealed to the court, based on his reduced mental capabilities.

A6.text: Lansky helped arrange a deal with the government via a high-ranking United States Navy official that secured Luciano's release from prison
